duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the execution of human resources strategy with key business units and act as a coach and consultant to achieve business strategies by focusing on employee performance, leader & team effectiveness, organizational design, organizational effectiveness, and diversity, equity, and inclusion solutions.

Establish and maintain an understanding of the business, employees, and leaders in the client organizations. Build effective working relationships with key stakeholders and employees at all levels of the organization.
Use insights to assess and provide solutions for key people and business issues. Employ a consultative approach and serve as a coach for leader and team effectiveness.

Collaborate and partner with leaders on organization design, workforce planning, and talent management to build a strong pipeline in the organization. Work closely with talent acquisition partners to attract great talent and ensure a diverse talent pipeline.

Assess employee training and development needs to help close gaps between current and future skill sets. Collaborate effectively across HR and actively support multiple HR priorities as a key member of the team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Human Resources Management
